cause.description:
Medicines for Humanity (MFH) is a group of people who believe that no child should die from a lack of basic medicines or primary healthcare. We strive to make a life and death difference to as many children as possible.
20,000 children die each day from 5 preventable conditions. These conditions could be treated with medicines costing less than a dollar.
Learn more about MFH: http://www.medicinesforhumanity.org
1. No child should die because they don’t have access to basic medicines and primary healthcare.
2. No parent should have to witness their child dying of a treatable disease.
cause.mission: Save the lives of impoverished children around the world
cause.name: Medicines for Humanity
